newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Amgen estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Amgen estimates cut.

text.p: Furman Selz said on Wednesday it lowered its earnings estimates on the shares of Amgen Inc after it said sales would slow for the rest of the year.
-- Analyst Jonas Alsenas said in a research note he reduced his 1997 earnings estimate to $2.72 per share from $2.81 per share and his 1998 estimate to $3.00 from $3.02.

-- The company said in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission it expected combined revenue growth for Epogen and Neupogen, its other major product, to be "somewhat less than double digit," Alsenas said.

-- "The fact both Epogen and Neupogen sales may disappoint investors in the short-term is a startling and unprecedented development that underscores our other stated potential concerns regarding Amgen's overall prospects," he said.
-- The stock extended Tuesday's losses, trading down 1-7/16 to 48-3/4.
